name: FInd the Differences 03 Free
description:
Download & play our addictive finding difference game. Use your eagle eye to find what’s different between two similar photos in the game. There are 5 differences between the pictures on each level and you must not make more than 2 mistakes. If you can find what’s the difference between the pictures on all 100 level then you will be a true champion of spot the difference and find the picture games!

Matching Search and finding difference games are pretty popular these days. Have you ever played the spot the difference game before? It’s pretty easy to play: you will get two photos that look almost the same. Your task is to find the differences between these 2 images. Since it’s basically the same picture, you might need to work hard to distinguish and finding picture differences. There are 5 secret spots where one picture is different than the other. It’s not hard to discover it if you have keen observation skills and eagle eye to discover it. To spot it, just tap on the spot. You have 3 lives. If you make 3 mistakes when you are looking for what’s different in this matching search game, then you have to repeat the level. That’s why it’s better to take your time to find out what’s different between these images.

=== FIND THE PICTURE DIFFERENCES BETWEEN 2 IMAGES FEATURES: ===
• FREE SPOT IT GAME. Our finding picture differences game is 100% FREE to play anytime you wish.
• 100 BEAUTIFUL IMAGES. There are 100 levels. Each level has a very stunning photo.
• SIMPLE RULE AND GAMEPLAY. Distinguish differences between two pictures that look almost the same. Spot it! Tap on the differences to mark them and let us know if you have discover it .
• COUNTLESS HOURS OF FUN. Spend countless hours of fun on our matching search game today!
• HINTS! Are you stuck? You can use hints to help you spot it and discover it!
• NO TIME LIMIT. Relax. We don’t rush you. Take as much time as you need to find what’s the difference between two images. Don’t be too quick to distinguish the images and tap too soon.
• HARD LEVEL. This spot the difference game is for seasoned players. If you are bored with easy levels, you will love this more challenging version of picture difference game. The secret spots are very hard to see unless you have really keen eagle eye.
It’s a fun addicting game for kids and adults. There are many beautiful images and all images are kid-friendly. They are all images of nature, animals, and other stunning photos. You will enjoy every minute of playing this game.
So, are you ready to delve into our world of wonders? There are a lot of secret spots waiting to be discovered. If you download it now, you can play finding picture differences right away.
---
Help us out! Our spot it game is FREE! We need your help to keep our game going. Please take a minute and leave us an awesome rating and review. Your support will mean the world for us and our apps!
